flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=36>>36 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 36 * (2/3) = <<36*2/3=42>>42 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 36 - 42 = <<36-42=-6>>-6 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has -6 + 10 + 3 = <<-6+10+3=7>>7 pairs of socks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
